title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets      Pets are NOT allowed in any buildings including the Visitor Center.Pets are NOT allowed within the fenced area of the cemetery.Pets are allowed on the site, however they must be on a leash at all times. You must clean up after your pets.Please be aware that there is no shade around the Visitor Center or the parking lot. Our summer temperatures are frequently over 100Â°.
